name: The Magical Substance: Coffee
description:
This game was made for the Ludum Dare 39 - Running out of Power game jam. It was submitted for the Compo.

Whether you like my game or not; please go to the Ludum Dare page for the game to vote - it only takes a couple of clicks and would mean a lot to me! Thank you in advance (click the "View Submission" button on the top-side of the page)

You've gotten the glorious task of securing a steady stream of coffee for your hardworking game developers, to make sure that they don't run out of their creative powers!
